record.id: field.name="logical.name" and file.name="device" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: logical.name
record.file.name: device

brief.brief: The system-generated unique ID for this configuration item.

detail.detail: The logical.name field is the cross reference designation in From and To fields. This is the primary field for cross reference and network describing network parent/child relationships. It can generated:
1. By the serial number assignment application, getnumb.
2. As a copy of another unique field in each type of Configuration Management record.
3. As a combination of fields within each type of configuration record that result in a unique key. Each configuration type has a default alternate combination of fields to use.
